tweets.text: @BBCNews @itvnews @Channel4News @SkyNews 5899 complaints in the month of March to the @EnvAgency about the stench coming from this poorly managed landfill that is run by @RedIndustries2. We are being poisoned! How is this not news!!! https://t.co/W4JY8WBWXB

@HMUG_Hackney @Hillfortian @PymmesBrookERS @StonebridgeLock @RiverChess @Feargal_Sharkey @mayorofhackney @deedeelea @AquiferChalk @RiverActionUK @AnglingTrust @WildTroutTrust @WindrushWasp @ChilternSociety @Chilternstreams @CleanIlkley @RiverBeane @BuryLung @FriendsRib @ReviveTheWye @RachSalv @UnderwaterMedia @suesustainable @DougskiK @stormwater_jo @RussellB1ggs @PJennings88 @EnvAgency @Ofwat @riverstrust @Thames21 @gis_michelle @theriverstrust Worth an ask.

@KarenShackleto5 @Hillfortian @PymmesBrookERS @StonebridgeLock @RiverChess @Feargal_Sharkey @mayorofhackney @deedeelea @AquiferChalk @RiverActionUK @AnglingTrust @WildTroutTrust @WindrushWasp @ChilternSociety @Chilternstreams @CleanIlkley @RiverBeane @BuryLung @FriendsRib @ReviveTheWye @RachSalv @UnderwaterMedia @suesustainable @DougskiK @stormwater_jo @RussellB1ggs @PJennings88 @EnvAgency @Ofwat @riverstrust @Thames21 @gis_michelle Good point -- the @theriverstrust map. Rather than us transcribing data back from that, maybe the Trust could give us copies of their underlying enhanced data?

@HMUG_Hackney @Hillfortian @PymmesBrookERS @StonebridgeLock @RiverChess @Feargal_Sharkey @mayorofhackney @deedeelea @AquiferChalk @RiverActionUK @AnglingTrust @WildTroutTrust @WindrushWasp @ChilternSociety @Chilternstreams @CleanIlkley @RiverBeane @BuryLung @FriendsRib @ReviveTheWye @RachSalv @UnderwaterMedia @suesustainable @DougskiK @stormwater_jo @RussellB1ggs @PJennings88 @EnvAgency @Ofwat @riverstrust @Thames21 @gis_michelle I think she s on it already.
Noxious gas stinking out the local hospital, curtesy of @RedIndustries2  is this ok @EnvAgencyMids ? @GBNEWS #stopthestink #stinkstopthe https://t.co/zQd8FAhQfD

@Hillfortian @PymmesBrookERS @StonebridgeLock @RiverChess @Feargal_Sharkey @mayorofhackney @deedeelea @AquiferChalk @RiverActionUK @AnglingTrust @WildTroutTrust @WindrushWasp @ChilternSociety @Chilternstreams @CleanIlkley @RiverBeane @BuryLung @FriendsRib @ReviveTheWye @RachSalv @UnderwaterMedia @suesustainable @DougskiK @KarenShackleto5 @stormwater_jo @RussellB1ggs @PJennings88 @EnvAgency @Ofwat @riverstrust @Thames21 Perhaps one task we could share is to take the 2020 storm overflow spreadsheets and annotate each site name with its river. Maybe someone is already doing that? I sat down to do the Lea & then I thought, maybe I'll ask around & save duplicating effort. https://t.co/Y8rVVZJMWZ

Cleanup action with @welshharpies along the #Silkstream next to the Silk Bridge in #WestHendon yesterday! Still a lot to do, but great to see how you can improve a neglected area in a short span of time with a group of motivated people working together! #cleantheharp https://t.co/fFJB4enu4m

@HMUG_Hackney @PymmesBrookERS @StonebridgeLock @RiverChess @Feargal_Sharkey @mayorofhackney @deedeelea @AquiferChalk @RiverActionUK @AnglingTrust @WildTroutTrust @WindrushWasp @ChilternSociety @Chilternstreams @CleanIlkley @RiverBeane @BuryLung @FriendsRib @ReviveTheWye @RachSalv @UnderwaterMedia @suesustainable @DougskiK @KarenShackleto5 @stormwater_jo @RussellB1ggs @PJennings88 @EnvAgency @Ofwat @riverstrust @Thames21 Exactly! keeping the intense light of scrutiny on them and staying together, sharing information and not working to cross-purposes. @sharkeee @wessexwater It‚Äôs so frustrating, get the same here regularly on local stream despite calling @EnvAgencySW pollution hotline and them responding very well, the polluters are everywhere and don‚Äôt seem to care about environmental laws or the authorities

Then and now. 1998 and campaigners warned that the Windrush was in serious trouble. How much untreated sewage was dumped in this river in 24 years by @thameswater ? @ATFreshwater @theriverstrust @Feargal_Sharkey https://t.co/mo6iPHVFpz

The streams here have been running lovely and clear now for at least 4 weeks, but now it‚Äôs turned to shit!
A local serial stream killer has fired up his digger once again. Much of this is pouring right into the @wessexwater reservoir supplying Bridgwater. https://t.co/2DH1cXK2vB

tweets.text:
How many face coverings did you see littered on your last beach walk?

Litter spoils the places we enjoy and can make its way into the sea and possibly harm marine life.

Bring a bag for your #litter when you go outdoors and take it home to dispose of.

#BinIt4Beaches https://t.co/5XocwdLO82

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

tweets.text:
Help keep our beaches #LitterFree this #BankHoliday weekend.

Litter left on the beach or next to full bins can easily be blown into the sea.

If a bin is full, take your rubbish home to throw away or recycle.

#RespectProtectEnjoy #BinIt4Beaches https://t.co/jDF0ha77ic

tweets.text:
Looking forward to a roast this #EasterWeekend?

Make sure you don't feed a #fatberg.

Never put used cooking fat and oil or food down your sink. They can damage your pipes and our environment.

Share this video to let others know.

#BinIt4Beaches https://t.co/ogSvSTZJDM
@SianieRoo @SuzVW @EnvAgency @AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe @PHE_EoEngland I'm sorry üòî It's so stressful and worrying. We can't keep living in fear for our health and the impact on the environment.

@SuzVW @EnvAgency @AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe It's unbearable. It woke me up again this morning & made me physically sick because the odour is so foul. It gets trapped in the house because we can't open the windows ü§Æ I really don't know what to do anymore. I'm not sure how long we can go on being poisoned in our own homes.

Our Fisheries Enforcement Officers are out patrolling the River Avon after reports of illegal fishing at Guy‚Äôs Cliff #Warwickshire.

It's now the closed season for coarse fish on England's rivers. Check when & where you can fish: https://t.co/m5OBQKp1jZ https://t.co/RUlISwlaaZ

Applications for grants of up to ¬£250k need to be submitted by the 14th April.

Apply now: https://t.co/RulW49d4WO https://t.co/3A80nYIRNO

If you missed it, you can catch up now on our YouTube channelüì∫ https://t.co/C12FtzGMBn

tweets.text: Dear @Jacob_Rees_Mogg & @EnvAgencySW. We had to go all the way to a public inquiry, without the support of @bathnes, to stop Mark Foley dumping asbestos in this quarry. So he dumps 100,000 tons of hazardous-waste instead. We warned you. Repeatedly. There must be another inquiry. https://t.co/skkkjIGeT3

@EnvAgencySE we (local concerned residents) spent the day doing your job. When are you going to help? A start would be to hold @thameswater to account and stop them releasing sewage into our river. We filled a large dump truck with plastic, sanitary waste, taurpaulin. (More) https://t.co/4CyhSUE6wL

Why do I have to wake up on a beautiful morning & worry about the landfill smell in my home, you smell outside & think thankfully perhaps not today but know others are suffering, it really has to stop in our homes, gardens & way of life, are you listening EA? you are to blame!

And also, well done to all the volunteers in Brighton and Hove who have spent their weekend, literally on their knees, cleaning up this mess. üëèüëè

tweets.text:
@StinkStopthe @RachSalv @BBCPanorama @EnvAgency @SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL this was posted by someone enduring these toxic gases on a daily basis. This has to stop

Leaving the area, and we're taking the family with us.

We can't take anymore.

I don't want to live like this.
@SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL It stonk this morning level 5 on Cambridge drive, Clayton

@SimonTagg @EnvAgencyMids @StinkStopthe @AaronBell4NUL I‚Äôve just driven from Clayton and through the Westlands towards the landfill site. Truly disgusting stench all the way. Wind from the north blowing in a southerly direction.
